column4: where do newly downloaded programs appear when I want to add them with "add applications"?
I just marked them for installation in synaptic and clicked apply now I want them in my menu
I'm checking how to launch it, give me a minute.
Do this! Alt + F2. In the box, type yafc
I cannot paste all the output in here now can I?
You do realise its a terminal ftp client?
Alt + F2 type "gnome-terminal", in the terminal type yafc
There is your program installed and running.
You can make one if you want.
